title: Len Lye: interview with Tyler Cann
brief_description: Tyler Cann, Curator of the Len Lye Collection at the Govett-Brewster Art Gallery in New Plymouth, New Zealand, visited ACMI during the Len Lye exhibition. Tyler Cann spoke about Len Lye’s influential and enduring body of work noting that this retrospective at ACMI is the largest and most comprehensive exhibition of the artist’s work to date. He focuses on particular works, some of which were reconstructed specifically for the ACMI exhibition.
